text:
hey guys so today I am at the seong 
Intercontinental Hotel having a New Year's

celebration with my extended family and I really 
wanted to show you guys this because I think it's

one of those hidden gems in Bangkok so at most 
sort of five-star hotels they will have elaborate

sort of buffet and when you think of buffet in 
North America you know it's not the greatest food

but in Thailand when the hotel a five-star hotel 
has some buffet it it's just mind-blowing so if

you come to Thailand and you just want to spend 
one nice evening you really just splurge a little

bit you know because it is a little expensive I 
think it's about forty to fifty dollars per head

u.s. dollars if you have coupons a lot of people 
have coupons you can get 50 percent off but it is

expensive but if you want a nice meal while you're 
in Bangkok at a at one of the nicer hotels any of

them will have really really good really really 
good buffet so it's kind of impossible for me

to show you everything but I'm just going to sort 
of give you a quick tour of what a buffet at one

of these hotels might include so they've got some 
dim sum booth over here with some Chinese barbecue

stock over here is a wok station with all sorts 
of stir fries and you've also got the grill where

you can grill they will grill different types 
of space skewers for you this one is a noodle

soup station so just like on the street so a 
lot of times these hotels to bring street food

to a nicer setting bread station every kind of 
bread you could imagine and this is a hot food

line with sort of all sorts of international 
dishes so this one's a fish of some sort some

more hot food some surprise some Brioni more 
stir-fried this is actually a pasta station so

you can pick different types of noodles different 
types of sauces and then they will make it fresh

for you it gets pretty fancy if that is a pile 
of foie gras and they will sear it for you with

mango sauce and rocket salad in here is a cold 
salad section so all sorts of different types

of salad and shot glasses some cold meats cured 
meats cold meat fresh seafood bar we've got crab

legs boy stirs shrimp there's some potato salad 
and some sushi bar right here my favorite part is

actually the dessert buffet it's always there's 
an insane amount of sweets let me show you this

is earlier in the night so people haven't really 
touched it but just just look at the amount of

last time I came someone stopped me from filming 
apparently you're not about to film but so I'm

just gonna keep going until somebody says 
something so just look at all this stuff I

mean it's just desserts upon dessert upon dessert 
and everything is a small bite-sized piece so you

can have as many as you want a giant pot of 
bread pudding all the sauces for the bread

pudding and then over here is a giant pot of 
apple crumble or some sort of a crumble and

this is a Thai dessert table so we've got 
a bunch of stuff in coconut milk lots of

fruits over here and these little things are Thai 
desserts but they are made into little bite-sized

pieces really really beautiful actually look 
at these how cute they are well it's a more

Thai dessert over here some black sticky rice 
with a coconut topping it just keeps going guys

I can't believe I'm still filming because the 
amount of food stuff keeps showing up so I hope

you enjoyed that a little bit I actually think 
I didn't cover everything because there's just

so much but I am going to go and eat now 
because everyone has already started and

so I hope you enjoyed that a little bit and 
next time you come to Bangkok make sure you

know save a night a nice night for you and 
your family dress up a little bit and come

and have dinner at one of these hotel buffets 
it's really really worth the time and the money
